assessments.status_rationale: Today’s bullets do not include the U.S. Census Bureau Advance Monthly Retail Sales release for April 2026 or any data on the retail-sales “control group.” The deadline (2026-05-15) has not yet arrived, so the outcome cannot be determined.
No item in today’s news provides a daily reading for the ICE BofA US Corporate Index OAS or indicates it has reached 150 bps. The deadline is 2026-08-31, so this remains unresolved.
Today’s bullets do not report a VIX close at or above 25.00 (nor any VIX close level). With deadline 2026-08-31, there is insufficient evidence to mark correct/incorrect.

No bullet references an OpenAI official post (blog/system card/release notes) about mitigation changes targeting sycophancy/over-agreeableness. Deadline is 2026-04-30; no confirming evidence appears in today’s items.

None of the listed articles mention CBP issuing a public notice tightening customs bond requirements or citing bond insufficiency/shortfalls or tariff-driven exposure. Deadline 2026-10-31 remains far out.

Today’s bullets do not mention OFAC publishing Venezuela-related FAQs/guidance/General Licenses clarifying payment routing/settlement for Venezuelan oil transactions. Deadline 2026-07-31 has not passed.

While there is a CNBC item about a rocky week for AI models from China, the provided bullets do not indicate an explicit attribution by Alibaba/Tencent/Baidu/ByteDance of a ≥1.0pp YoY operating margin decline to AI consumer-app subsidies/promotions/giveaways. Deadline 2026-08-31; unresolved.
No bullet includes intraday U.S. 2-year Treasury yield levels or evidence it traded at or below 3.50%. The deadline (2026-12-31) is not yet reached.
None of the news bullets describe NIH/CDC/EPA/FDA announcing a microplastics-focused funding program or awards totaling at least $50M. Deadline 2026-12-31; no clear triggering evidence today.
